allow:
Bash(git commit -m "$\(cat <<''EOF''
Add landing page and Supabase email/password auth

Implements a marketing landing page with header, hero, features, pricing,
and footer sections. Adds full authentication flow with Supabase including
login, signup, forgot/reset password, logout, and session management via
Next.js 16 proxy.

Co-Authored-By: Claude Opus 4.6 <noreply@anthropic.com>
EOF
\)")
